tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (EX There)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN company)) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (SBAR (RB once) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP leave) (NP (DT this) (NN company))))) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD will) (ADVP (RB NEVER)) (VP (VB deal) (PP (IN with)))))))) (. .)))
